groups.description:
CSS is organized in modules like "CSS Types" or "CSS Color".
MDN organizes features in these groups as well â€” `groups` should contain the name of the module(s) the type is defined in.

status.description: This is either `standard`, `nonstandard`, or `experimental` depending on the standardization status of the feature.

mdn_url.description:
URL linking to the type's page on MDN.
This URL must omit the localization part of the URL (such as `en-US/`).
